overview: Marc Faber has joined BIP in January 2003. Besides his overall management responsibilities, Marc is in particular in charge of developing the Private Equity and Venture Capital activities of the firm. Before joining BIP, Marc Faber was CFO in a leading privately held carbide manufacturer. For over ten years he was also responsible there for Corporate Strategic Planning, Controlling and IT. Before this assignment, Marc spent 8 years with IBM in different Marketing and Sales positions.
